name: Dr Emily Carter
bio: Board-certified cardiologist with over 12 years of experience in heart failure and interventional procedures.

name: Dr Li Wei
bio: Specializes in skin disorders and cosmetic dermatology with advanced training in laser treatments.

name: Dr Carlos Soto
bio: Orthopedic surgeon focused on joint replacement, sports injuries, and rehabilitation protocols.

name: Dr Amina Khan
bio: Expert in diabetes and thyroid disorders with over a decade of international experience.

name: Dr Marcus Lee
bio: Specializes in epilepsy and neurodegenerative diseases with published work in global journals.

name: Dr Isabelle Moreau
bio: Trusted pediatrician with experience in developmental assessments and family education.

name: Dr Daniel Smith
bio: Psychiatrist focusing on adolescent mental health, trauma recovery, and telepsychiatry.

name: Dr Sofia Rossi
bio: Dedicated to women's health with a focus on fertility treatments and minimally invasive surgery.

bio: Pulmonologist experienced in managing asthma, COPD, and post-COVID respiratory care.

name: Dr Nora
bio: Specialist in autoimmune diseases and chronic joint pain with experience in international teleconsultations.
